roms.changelog:
- Import default dex2oat sets from redbull and adapt to sdm660
- Limit the dex2oat resouce when thermal stress
- Enable dex2oat64 usage
- Update DPM Stack from DDV
- Enable DPM features
- Disable Async MTE on System Server
- Disable RX wakelock feature in both rom side and kernel side
- XiaomiParts: Add translations for several languages
- kernel: Upstream to v4.4.302 (EOL of 4.4 baseline)
- kernel: Avoid some overhead
- kernel: Optimize to reduce some CPU power consumption with WiFi
- Other fixes and improvements

roms.wifi: 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac, Dual-band, Wi-Fi Direct, Wi-Fi Display, Hotspot

roms.changelog:
• Upstreamed kernel to 4.14.261
• Switch to AOSP clang 14.0.1
• Adapt sepolicy to Android 12
• Remove enable_advanced_sf_offset prop
• Disable unspecialized app process pool
• Attach vendor_property_type to properties
• Specify vendor_fp_prop as vendor public prop
• Allow ioctl to zram_swap for performance
• Add aux camera packagelist prop to system props
• Update the transcoding operating rate
• Set SSR restart_level in init.qcom.rc
• Label more wakeup nodes
• Label idle_state sysfs nodes
• Made transition animation a bit faster
• Limit screen recorder frame rate to 60fps
• Adjusting screen timeouts
• Dont inherit updatable_apex.mk
• Disable partial FB excl rect
• Disable global mode and CDMA choices
• Show 4G icon for all carriers
• Only make recovery permissive on non production builds
• Remove TxPower2g and 5g from wifi config file
• Disable all wifi related logging
• Fix OTA auto-flashing with encrypted f2fs
• Set media vol steps to 25
• Kill IMS logspam with fire
• Update config_safe_media_volume_index
• Slightly increase the minimum brightness level
• Use FUSE passthrough by default
• Update vendor security patch level
• Switched back to OpenGL as default GPU renderer
• Import and build GPS stack from LA.UM.9.1.r1-11500-SMxxx0.0
• Increase gps batch size to max
• Lower gps debug level
• Localise NTP to improve GPS TTFF

- Enabled audiosphere effect by default

- Fixed postprocessing daemon crashes
- Misc changes for infra

Some stability improvements.

- Updated HALs and rebased kernel on LA.UM.10.2.1.r1-02700-sdm660.0

- Initial A12 build

roms.changelog:
Firmware: V12.5.6
Date: 2022-1-8
Changelog:
1. Sync with the latest source
2. Switch to Lawnchair

2021-12-12
1. Sync with the latest source
2. Merge tag LA.UM.9.12.r1-13500.01-SMxx50.QSSI12.0 into kernel source
 
2021-12-11
1. Sync with the latest source
2. Support dc dimming

2021-12-05
1. Sync with the latest source
2. Fix 5x lens problem

2021-11-25
1. Sync with the latest source
2. Fix ims problem

2021-11-21
1. Sync with the latest source
2. Switch to new kernel based on LA.UM.9.12.r1-13300-SMxx50.QSSI12.0
3. Adapt brightness values

2021-11-2
1. Sync with the latest source
2. Fix brightness level mapping
3. Handle more scenarios when getting fod dim alpha
4. Update brightness and vibrator configs

2021-11-1
1. Sync with the latest source

2021-10-30
1. Sync with the latest source
2. Ship GCamGOPrebuilt instead of Camera2/Snap
3. Bring back IFAAManager
4. Move to AOSP WFD

2021-10-27
1. Sync with the latest source

2021-10-26
1. Disable FBE(Maybe you should clean flash to make twrp decrypt data)
2. Limit charging current to 6A (Fix overheating when charging)
3. Fix multiple SIM cards display
4. ...

2021-10-17:
1. Initial releases
2. SeLinux permissive
3. Test version

specs.cpu: Octa-core (1x2.84 GHz Kryo 585 & 3x2.42 GHz Kryo 585 & 4x1.80 GHz Kryo 585)
specs.sensors: Fingerprint (under display, optical), accelerometer, gyro, proximity, compass, color spectrum, barometer

roms.changelog:
Kernel changes:
• Upstreamed to .232
• Merge latest CAF tag LA.UM.9.1.r1-10200-SMxxx0.0
• Merge WireGuard v1.0.20210424
• Improve low memory killer
• Mirco-optimize scheduler
• Drop unused NUMA feature(Non-Uniform Memory Access)
• Bring back userspace boost method
• Add some thermal zones for mi_thermald
• Enable Ftrace for iorap perfetto

Device specific changes:
• Update prebuilt firmware and blobs from cepheus-user 11 RKQ1.200826.002 21.4.7 release-keys
• Switch to POCO X3 Pro Global Listen stack and hotwordenrollment blobs (fixes screen off Google hotword detection and low mic volume when enabled OK Google)
• Add proper configs for burn-in protection
• Drop non-functional power off alarm blobs
• Reset to miui stock audio configs
• Cleanup SEPolicy rules also resolve all neverallow rues
• Disable GPU Boost during interaction powerhint
• Fix camera stutter in some apps
• Enable iorap readahead (Improve app startup time)
• Enable unspecialized app process pool
• Use Gcam Go only with gapped releases (use snap with vanila releases)
• Update to June redfin fingerprint 
• Flatten APEXs for performance
• Make the UI smoother
• Use "Xiaomi Mi 9" for default ssid name 
• Some stuff else, go read commit list on Github.

roms.changelog:
January security patch
Rebase and clean trees and drop unneeded stuff
Add Mi Sound Enhancer and Hi-Fi to XiaomiParts and show Ambient Display correctly
Switch arch variant to armv8-2a-dotprod
Update some hals, caf vendor blobs from LA.UM.9.1.r1-10900-SMxxx0.0 and caf system blobs from LA.QSSI.12.0.r1-05600-qssi.0
Update gps from LA.UM.9.1.r1-10200-SMxxx0.0
Fix neverallows and address more denials
Fix brightness changing too frequently and increase minimum values
Fix VoLTE no call sound till the other part answers
Disable blur on app launch
Bump zram to 3gb
Dont pin camera and launcher in memory
Disable light sensor for pocket lock
Update unpinned blobs from 12.5.5.0.RFDMIXM and import missing blobs from LA.UM.9.1.r1-10900-SMxxx0.0
Kill some logspam
Kernel version upstreamed to 4.14.262
Kernel caf tag upstreamed to LA.UM.9.1.r1-11500-SMxxx0.0
More, more and more...

Clean install is mandatory!
Recommended firmware: 12.5.5

Firmware and vendor require lastest MIUI Stable V12.2.10

- Show FOD Animation settings
- Update WifiOverlay and TetheringOverlay
- wifi: Enable QPower and Deep sleep together
- Remove extra GBoard spacing
- Update CarrierConfig overlays
- More comfortable rounded corners
